Translations.Text: hananimkkeseo jinlilo cheonjileul changjohasyeoss-eum-eul neohuineun alji moshaneu nyo geubun-i wonhasil ttae neohuileul jegeo hasigo saelohi changjohasinila

geudeul moduga mudeom-eulobuteo junim ap-eulo naomae yeon-yaghan jadeul i omanhan jadeul-ege malhagil sillo ulineun neohuileul chujonghaess-euni neohuineun-ulileul hananim-ui beollobuteo jogeum-ilado bohohal su issneunyago muddeola hananim-i ulileul indohaess-eossdeolamyeon ulido neohuileul indohaess-eulila ije-uliga noyeowohageona innaehanda hadeolado byeoldoliga eobs-euni uliegeneun pisincheoga eobsnolago hadeola

geu il-i gyeoljeongdoeeoss-eul ttae sa tan-i malhagil sillo hananim-i neohui ege jinsil-ui yagsog-eul hasyeossgie na do neohuiege yagsoghayeoss-euna silpaehayeossdoda na-egen neohuileul jibaehal gwon neung-i eobs-eoss-euna naega neohuileul buleu mae neohuiga naege ungdabhayeoss-eul ppun-i la geuleomeulo naleul binanhaji malgo neohui jasindeul-eul binanhala naega neo huileul doul su eobs-eumyeo neohuiga naleuldoul su eobsnola sillo naneun neohuigaijeon-e naleul hananimgwa daedeungke haess deon geos-eul bulsinhanila sillo umaehan jadeul-egen gotongseuleoun beol-i iss-eul ppun-ila

geuleona mid-eum-eul gajgo seon-eul haenghaneun jadeul-eun gang-i heuleuneun cheongug-e deul-eoga geugos-eseo junim-ui heolag-euloyeongsaenghamyeo geugos-eseo pyeong-anhasoseo lago cheonsaui insaleul badnola

neohuineun hananimkkeseo eotteohge biyuhasyeossneunji alji moshaneunyo hullyunghan han madiui mal-eun alchan han geulu ui namuwa gatdago haessgeoneul geu ppu lineun dandanhago geu gajineun haneullo hyanghanila hasyeossdeola
